answers.answer: The nursery is adorable.  I love the colors.  The mobile is a great idea- I can't believe you made it yourself- great job!!!  The ultrasound pictures are awesome- how exciting!

I LOVE the nursery!!  You did a GREAT job!   Your 4-D's turned out great as well!  We didn't have such good luck :-( but we'll see him in person soon enough!  I'm glad you got good ones for keepsakes though!!!

Thanks! The only good news about having a high-risk pregnancy (I've had high blood pressure and gestational diabetes) is that I get free 4D pics at my monthly fetal growth checkups! So far, he's doing well. He's 4 lbs 8 ounces ballpark so he's not getting too big in there.: )

question: Hi guys! I just posted some pictures of our nursery (so far) and also some new 4D photos from last week! Let me know what you think!? I haven't gotten to show the nursery to but a few people and I'd love to know what people think about it! It's been hard work - as you all know!Hope everyone is doing well in these final weeks! : )Heather
title: Just posted pics of the nursery!
